bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number, or major revision, of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates whether the architecture is given in the feature registers

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the part number

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision number, or minor revision, of the processor

bitField.name: Cluster_ID
bitField.description: The value of the CLUSTERID configuration pins

bitField.name: CPU_ID
bitField.description: CPU identifier

bitField.name: State3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment (ThumbEE).

bitField.name: State2
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle extension interface.

bitField.name: State1
bitField.description: Indicates the type of Thumb encoding that the processor supports.

bitField.name: State0
bitField.description: Indicates support for ARM instruction set.

bitField.name: Security_extensions
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions Architecture v1.

bitField.name: Programmers_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer's model

bitField.name: Secure_debug_model_coprocessor_based
bitField.description: Indicates support for the secure debug model coprocessor.

bitField.name: Core_debug_model_coprocessor_based
bitField.description: Indicates support for the coprocessor debug model.

bitField.name: FCSE
bitField.description: Indicates support for fast context switch memory mappings.

bitField.name: Auxiliary_control_register
bitField.description: Indicates support for Auxiliary Control Register.

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA.

bitField.name: Cache_coherency_with_DMA
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency with DMA agent, shared memory.

bitField.name: Cache_coherency_with_CPU
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency support with CPU agent, shared memory.

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Protected Memory System Architecture (PMSA).

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture (VMSA).

bitField.name: BTB
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch target buffer.

bitField.name: L1_test_clean_ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_maintenance_ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_maintenance__ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, all maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_line_maintenance_ops_by_set_and_way
bitField.gui_name: L1 unified cache line maintenance ops by set and way
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_line_maintenance_ops_by_set_and_way
bitField.gui_name: L1 Harvard cache line maintenance ops by set and way
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by set and way, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: L1_unified_cache_line_maintenance_ops_by_VA
bitField.gui_name: L1 unified cache line maintenance ops by VA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by VA, unified architecture.

bitField.name: L1_Harvard_cache_line_maintenance_ops_by_VA
bitField.gui_name: L1 Harvard cache line maintenance operations by VA
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by VA, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Hardware_access_flag
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware access flag.

bitField.name: WFI
bitField.description: Indicates support for wait-for-interrupt stalling.

bitField.name: Memory_barrier_features
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory barrier operations.

bitField.name: Unified_TLB_maintenance_ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations,unified architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_TLB_maintenance_ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_cache_maintenance_range_ops
bitField.gui_name: Harvard L1 cache maintenance range ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_background_prefetch_cache_range_ops
bitField.gui_name: Harvard L1 background prefetch cache range ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Harvard_L1_foreground_prefetch_cache_range_ops
bitField.gui_name: Harvard L1 foreground prefetch cache range ops
bitField.description: Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture.

bitField.name: Branch_predictor_maintenance
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch predictor maintenance operations.

bitField.name: Hierarchical_cache_maintenance_ops_by_set_and_way
bitField.gui_name: Hierarchical cache maintenance ops by set and way
bitField.description: Indicates support for invalidate cache by set and way, clean by set and way, and invalidate and clean by set and way.

bitField.name: Hierarchical_cache_maintenance_ops_by_MVA
bitField.gui_name: Hierarchical cache maintenance ops by MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for invalidate cache by MVA, clean by MVA, invalidate and clean by MVA, and invalidate all.

bitField.name: Divide_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for divide instructions.

bitField.name: Debug_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for debug instructions.

bitField.name: Coproc_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor instructions.

bitField.name: CmpBranch_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions.

bitField.name: Bitfield_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for bitfield instructions.

bitField.name: BitCount_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions.

bitField.name: Atomic_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions.

bitField.name: Jazelle_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Jazelle instructions.

bitField.name: Interwork_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for instructions that branch between ARM and Thumb code.

bitField.name: Immediate_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for immediate instructions.

bitField.name: IfThen_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for If ... Then instructions.

bitField.name: Extend_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions.

bitField.name: Except2_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 2 instructions.

bitField.name: Except1_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for exception 1 instructions.

bitField.name: Endian_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions.

bitField.name: Reversal_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for reversal instructions.

bitField.name: PSR_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for PSR instructions.

bitField.name: MultU_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions.

bitField.name: MultS_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions.

bitField.name: Mult_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for multiply instructions.

bitField.name: MultAccessInt_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions.

bitField.name: MemHint_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions.

bitField.name: LoadStore_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for load and store instructions.

bitField.name: T2ExeEnvExtn_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb-2 execution environment extension instructions.

bitField.name: TrueNOP_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions.

bitField.name: ThumbCopy_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions.

bitField.name: TabBranch_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions.

bitField.name: SynchPrim_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions.

bitField.name: SWI_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for SWI instructions.

bitField.name: SIMD_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions.

bitField.name: Saturate_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for saturate instructions.

bitField.name: Syncprim_instrs_frac
bitField.gui_name: Fractional support for synchronization primitive instructions
bitField.description: Indicates fractional support for synchronization primitive instructions

bitField.name: Barrier_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for barrier instructions.

bitField.name: SMI_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for SMI instructions.

bitField.name: Writeback_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for writeback instructions.

bitField.name: WithShifts_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for with-shift instructions.

bitField.name: Unpriv_instrs
bitField.description: Indicates support for Unprivileged instructions.

bitField.name: Force_AP
bitField.description: This bit controls the Force AP functionality in the MMU that generates Access Bit faults.

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.name: NMFI
bitField.description: Behaviour of FIQs

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: This bit determines the setting of the CPSR E bit on taking an exception

bitField.name: XP
bitField.description: This bit configures the hardware page translation mechanism

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Enables unaligned data access operations, including support for mixed little-endian and big-endian operation.

bitField.name: L4
bitField.description: Determines if the T bit is set when load instructions change the PC

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Location of exception vectors

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Level 1 Instruction Cache enable/disable

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Program Flow Enable/Disable

bitField.name: ROM_protection
bitField.description: ROM Protection

bitField.name: Sys_protection
bitField.description: System protection. This bit modifies the MMU protection system

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Level 1 Data Cache enable/disable

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Strict data address alignment fault checking

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable/disable

bitField.name: L1_parity
bitField.description: L1 parity checking

bitField.name: SMP
bitField.description: Signals if the CPU is taking part in coherency or not

bitField.name: EXCL
bitField.description: This bit enables the exclusive behavior of L1 if the processor is used in conjunction with an L2 cache supporting that behavior

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Instruction folding enable. This bit enables the use of instruction folding if program flow prediction is enabled

bitField.name: SB
bitField.description: Static branch prediction enable. This bit enables the use of static branch prediction if program flow prediction is enabled.

bitField.name: DB
bitField.description: Dynamic branch prediction enable. This bit enables the use of dynamic branch prediction if program flow prediction is enabled.

bitField.name: RS
bitField.description: Return stack enable. This bit enables the use of the return stack if program flow prediction is enabled.

register.name: COPROCESSOR_ACCESS_CONTROL
register.description: Coprocessor Access Control. Only VFP coprocessors are available for MPCore

bitField.name: CP11
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 11

bitField.name: CP10
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 10

bitField.name: ILsize
bitField.description: The number of instruction TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: DLsize
bitField.description: The number of unified or data TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Specifies if the TLB is unified, or if there are separate instruction and data TLBs

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to nonshared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to nonshared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: External Abort Qualifier

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort.

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

bitField.name: SD
bitField.description: External Abort Qualifier

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

register.gui_name: Invalidate Unified TLB Single Entry by MVA with ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Unified TLB Single Entry by MVA with ASID match

register.gui_name: Invalidate Unified TLB Entries on ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Unified TLB Entries on ASID match

register.gui_name: Invalidate Instruction TLB Single Entry by MVA with ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Instruction TLB Single Entry by MVA with ASID match

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_I_ASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate Instruction TLB Entries on ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Instruction TLB Entries on ASID match

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_D_MVA_ASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data TLB Single Entry by MVA with ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Data TLB Single Entry by MVA with ASID match

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_D_ASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data TLB Entries on ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Data TLB Entries on ASID match

bitField.name: Victim
bitField.description: Specifies the entry in the lockdown region where a subsequent hardware page table walk can place a TLB entry.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Determines if subsequent hardware page table walks place the TLB entry in the lockdown region at the entry specified by the victim

bitField.name: Remap_shareable_S1_Normal
bitField.description: Remaps shareable attribute when S=1 for Normal regions

bitField.name: Remap_shareable_S0_Normal
bitField.description: Remaps shareable attribute when S=0 for Normal regions

bitField.name: Remap_shareable_S1_Device
bitField.description: Remaps shareable attribute when S=1 for Device regions

bitField.name: Remap_shareable_S0_Device
bitField.description: Remaps shareable attribute when S= 0 for Device regions

bitField.name: Remap_111
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b111

bitField.name: Remap_101
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b101

bitField.name: Remap_100
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b100

bitField.name: Remap_011
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b011

bitField.name: Remap_010
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b010

bitField.name: Remap_001
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b001

bitField.name: Remap_000
bitField.description: Remaps {TEX[0],C,B} = b000

bitField.name: Remap_outer_111
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b111

bitField.name: Impl_defined
bitField.description: Implementation defined

bitField.name: Remap_outer_101
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b101

bitField.name: Remap_outer_100
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b100

bitField.name: Remap_outer_011
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b011

bitField.name: Remap_outer_010
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b010

bitField.name: Remap_outer_001
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b001

bitField.name: Remap_outer_000
bitField.description: Remaps outer attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b000

bitField.name: Remap_inner_111
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b111

bitField.name: Remap_inner_101
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b101

bitField.name: Remap_inner_100
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b100

bitField.name: Remap_inner_011
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b011

bitField.name: Remap_inner_010
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b010

bitField.name: Remap_inner_001
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b001

bitField.name: Remap_inner_000
bitField.description: Remaps inner attribute for {TEX[0],C,B} = b000

register.name: PID
register.description: The FCSE PID Register provides the ProcID for fast context switch memory mappings. The MMU uses the contents of this register to map memory addresses in the range 0-32MB.

bitField.name: FCSE_PID
bitField.description: Identifies a specific process for fast context switch.Holds the ProcID. The reset value is 0.

register.name: CID
register.description: The purpose of the Context ID Register is to provide information on the current ASID and process ID, for example for the ETM and debug logic.

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID

register.name: USER_RW_ID
register.description: User Read/Write Thread and Process ID

register.name: USER_RO_ID
register.description: User Read-only Thread and Process ID

register.name: PRIVILEGED_ID
register.description: Privileged Only Thread and Process ID

register.name: VA_PRIV_READ
register.description: VA to PA translation with privileged read permission check

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Upper 22 bits of Virtual Address to translate

register.name: VA_PRIV_WRITE
register.description: VA to PA translation with privileged write permission check

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Upper 22 bits of Virtual Address to translate

register.name: VA_USER_READ
register.description: VA to PA translation with user read permission check

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Upper 22 bits of Virtual Address to translate

register.name: VA_USER_WRITE
register.description: VA to PA translation with user write permission check

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Upper 22 bits of Virtual Address to translate

register.name: PA
register.description: PA after a successful translation or source of the abort for an unsuccessful translation

bitField.name: Evt_count_0
bitField.description: Identifies the source of events for Count Register 0

bitField.name: Evt_count_1
bitField.description: Identifies the source of events for Count Register 1

bitField.name: CCR
bitField.description: Cycle Count Register 0 overflow flag.

bitField.name: CR_1
bitField.description: Count Register 1 overflow flag.

bitField.name: CR_0
bitField.description: Count Register 0 overflow flag.

bitField.name: ECC_intr
bitField.description: Enable Cycle Counter interrupt.

bitField.name: EC_1_intr
bitField.description: Enable Counter Register 1 interrupt.

bitField.name: EC_0_Intr
bitField.description: Enable Counter Register 0 interrupt.

bitField.name: D
bitField.description: Cycle count divider

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle Counter Register Reset on Write, UNP on Read

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Count Register Reset on Write, UNP on Read

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Enables or Disables all the three counters

bitField.name: Ctype
bitField.description: Specifies if the cache supports lockdown or not, and how it is cleaned

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies if the cache is a Unified Cache, S=0, or separate ICache and DCache, S=1

bitField.name: Dsize_P
bitField.description: The P bit indicates if there is a restriction on page allocation for bits [13:12] of the Virtual Address

bitField.name: Dsize_Size
bitField.description: The Size field determines the cache size in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Dsize_Assoc
bitField.description: The Assoc field determines the cache associativity in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Dsize_M
bitField.description: The multiplier bit determines the cache size and cache associativity values in conjunction with the Size and Assoc fields. If the cache is present, M must be set to 0. If the cache is absent, M must be set to 1.

bitField.name: Dsize_Len
bitField.description: The Len field determines the line length of the cache

bitField.name: Isize_P
bitField.description: The P bit indicates if there is a restriction on page allocation for bits [13:12] of the Virtual Address

bitField.name: Isize_Size
bitField.description: The Size field determines the cache size in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Isize_Assoc
bitField.description: The Assoc field determines the cache associativity in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Isize_M
bitField.description: The multiplier bit determines the cache size and cache associativity values in conjunction with the Size and Assoc fields. If the cache is present, M must be set to 0. If the cache is absent, M must be set to 1.

bitField.name: Isize_Len
bitField.description: The Len field determines the line length of the cache

register.gui_name: Invalidate Data Cache Line, using MVA
register.description: Invalidate Data Cache Line, using MVA

register.gui_name: Invalidate Data Cache Line, using Set/Way

register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Entire Data Cache

register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line, using Set/Way
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line, using Set/Way

bitField.name: D_cache_way_3
bitField.description: Locks cache way 3.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_cache_way_2
bitField.description: Locks cache way 2.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_cache_way_1
bitField.description: Locks cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_cache_way_0
bitField.description: Locks cache way 0.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.
